subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: A likely first-round pick in the N.B.A. draft in June, Rice's Morris Almond was the third-leading scorer in N.C.A.A. Division I entering Friday at 27.7 points a game.
snippet: A likely first-round pick in the N.B.A. draft in June, Rice's Morris Almond was the third-leading scorer in N.C.A.A. Division I entering Friday at 27.7 points a game.
